attr.a:
Let $`F`$ be the event that the customer buys a cup of coffee, $`K`$ a piece of cake.

```math
\begin{aligned}
  &P(F, K) = 0.2 \\
  &\rightarrow P(F|K)P(K) = 0.2 \\
  &\rightarrow P(F|K) * 0.7 = 0.2 \\
  &\rightarrow P(F|K) = \frac{2}{7} \\
\end{aligned}
```
